title.rendered: Hearth and Home Describes Talus Artisan Fire Bowl as ‘Modern and Desirable Fire Feature’

content.rendered:
The Eldorado Stone Talus Artisan Fire Bowl was featured in the February 2016 issue of Hearth and Home magazine. The outdoor living industry publication displayed a full-color installation shot of the fire bowl, and notes that it is one of the most modern and desirable fire features within the “A Fire Pit is Really an Affordable Lifestyle in a Box” article. The editor shares that the bowl “accentuates the modern and contemporary designs with clean lines and simplistic colors that appeal to a variety of aesthetics.” The feature can be found on page 40.

Click here for more information on the Talus Artisan Fire Bowl.
